JOHN 15.3 ju jus hrainjai sijuþ in þis waurdis þatei rodida du izwis.
JOHN 15.4 wisaiþ in mis jah ik in izwis.
swe sa weinatains ni mag akran bairan af sis silbin, niba ist ana weinatriwa, swah nih jus, niba in mis sijuþ.
JOHN 15.5 ik im þata weinatriu, iþ jus weinatainos;
saei wisiþ in mis jah ik in imma, swa bairiþ akran manag, þatei inuh mik ni maguþ taujan ni waiht.
JOHN 15.6 niba saei wisiþ in mis, uswairpada ut swe weinatains, jah gaþaursniþ jah galisada, jah in fon galagjand jah inbrannjada.
JOHN 15.7 aþþan jabai sijuþ in mis, jah waurda meina in izwis sind, þataƕah þei wileiþ bidjiþ, jah wairþiþ izwis.
JOHN 15.8 in þamma hauhiþs ist atta meins, ei akran manag bairaiþ jah wairþaiþ meinai siponjos.
JOHN 15.9 swaswe frijoda mik atta, swah ik frijoda izwis;
wisaiþ in friaþwai meinai.
JOHN 15.10 jabai anabusnins meinos fastaid, sijuþ in friaþwai meinai, swaswe ik anabusnins attins meinis fastaida, jah wisa in friaþwai is.
JOHN 15.11 þata rodida izwis, ei faheþs meina in izwis sijai, jah faheds izwara usfulljaidau.
JOHN 15.12 þata ist anabusns meina, ei frijoþ izwis misso, swaswe ik frijoda izwis.
JOHN 15.13 maizein þizai friaþwa manna ni habaiþ, ei ƕas saiwala seina lagjiþ faur frijonds seinans.
JOHN 15.14 jus frijonds meinai sijuþ, jabai taujiþ þatei ik anabiuda izwis.
JOHN 15.15 þanaseiþs izwis ni qiþa skalkans;
unte skalks ni wait ƕa taujiþ is frauja,
iþ ik izwis qaþ frijonds, unte all þatei hausida at attin meinamma, gakannida izwis.

JOHN 15.16 ni jus mik gawalideduþ, ak ik gawalida izwis jah gasatida izwis ei jus sniwaiþ jah akran bairaiþ, jah akran izwar du aiwa sijai, ei þataƕah þei bidjaiþ attan in namin meinamma, gibiþ izwis.
JOHN 15.17 þata anabiuda izwis ei frijoþ izwis misso.
JOHN 15.18 jabai so manaseds izwis fijai, kunneiþ ei mik fruman izwis fijaida.
JOHN 15.19 jabai þis fairƕaus weseiþ, aiþþau so manaseds swesans frijodedi;
aþþan unte us þamma fairƕau ni sijuþ, ak ik gawalida izwis us þamma fairƕau, duþþe fijaid izwis so manaseþs.
JOHN 15.20 gamuneiþ þis waurdis þatei ik qaþ du izwis:
nist skalks maiza fraujin seinamma.
jabai mik wrekun, jah izwis wrikand;
jabai mein waurd fastaidedeina, jah izwar fastaina.
JOHN 15.21 ak þata allata taujand izwis in namins meinis, unte ni kunnun þana sandjandan mik.
JOHN 15.22 nih qemjau jah rodidedjau du im, frawaurht ni habaidedeina:
iþ nu inilons ni haband bi frawaurht seina.
JOHN 15.23 saei mik fijaiþ, jah attan meinana fijaiþ.
JOHN 15.24 iþ þo waurstwa ni gatawidedjau in im þoei anþar ainshun ni gatawida, frawaurht ni habaidedeina;
iþ nu jah gaseƕun mik jah fijaidedun jah mik jah attan meinana.
JOHN 15.25 ak ei usfullnodedi waurd þata gamelido in witoda ize: ei
fijaidedun mik arwjo.
JOHN 15.26 aþþan þan qimiþ parakletus þanei ik insandja izwis fram attin, ahman sunjos izei fram attin urrinniþ, sa weitwodeiþ bi mik.
JOHN 15.27 jah þan jus weitwodeiþ, unte fram fruma miþ mis sijuþ.
JOHN 16.1 þata rodida izwis, ei ni afmarzjaindau.
JOHN 16.2 us gaqumþim dreiband izwis;
akei qimiþ ƕeila, ei saƕazuh izei usqimiþ izwis, þuggkeiþ hunsla saljan guda.
JOHN 16.3 jah þata taujand, unte ni ufkunþedun attan nih mik.
JOHN 16.4 akei þata rodida izwis, ei biþe qimai so ƕeila ize, gamuneiþ þize þatei ik qaþ izwis.
iþ þata izwis fram fruma ni qaþ, unte miþ izwis was.
JOHN 16.5 Iþ nu gagga du þamma sandjandin mik, jah ainshun us izwis ni fraihniþ mik:
ƕaþ gaggis?
JOHN 16.6 akei unte þata rodida izwis, gauriþa gadaubida izwar hairto.
JOHN 16.7 akei ik sunja izwis qiþa:
batizo ist izwis ei ik galeiþau;
